book.title: The Red Chancellor
book.description: 简介： Of what? It was I who asked the question, curious to hear what penalty attached to the handsome Rittmeisters temerity.The three men gave glances at each other, as though inquiring which of them could answer. My friend Von Lindheim broke the pause, re...
